title: Honest Long Cut Unopened Tobacco Pouch (1910-1915) FS

posts.post_title: Honest Long Cut Unopened Tobacco Pouch (1910-1915) FS
posts.post_content:
I have an unopened package of Honest Long Cut available for sale.  The package dates sometime between 1910 and 1915 although I cannot be sure of exact year as the overprint is missing from the tax stamp). Package is in EX condition with no rips, tears, etc... unopened and untampered with.  $150 shipped.

Please email me for photos: [url]jon_canfield@hotmail.com[/url]

email sent, ole friend.

best,
barry
